title: mandirk-kughandadu
sahitya:
manadirk-kughandadu murugan rUpam mAyayai nIkkuvudu avan tiru nAmam


anupallavi

  dinamum kAppadu avan kai vEl tIra vinayaiyum tIrkkum kadirvEl


caraNam    eNNum eNNamellAm niraivErum paNNum pUjaiyinAl phalan uNDAgum 
maNNil nAm paDum tuyar tIrum mAra inbam manadinil shErum
